content: उदय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Following, coming after or upon (as a letter, accent &c.); उदयशब्दः परशब्दसमानार्थः प्रातिशाख्येषु प्रसिद्धः, --यः {@--1@} Rise (fig also); चंद्रोदय इवोदधेः <ls>R. 12. 36</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 73</ls>; going upwards, ascending (as of the sun, stars &c.). {@--2@} ({%a%}) Rising up, coming forth; द्रविण° acquisition of wealth; <ls>Pt. 2.</ls>; so भाग्य° dawn of fortune; <ls>Amaru. 25</ls>; स्वगुणोदयेन <ls>Pt. 1. 94.</ls> ({%b%}) Appearance, becoming visible, production; घनोदयः प्राक् <ls>Ś. 7. 30</ls>; मेघ° <ls>Ku. 6. 54</ls>; हसितमन्यनिमित्तकृतोदयं <ls>Ś. 2. 11</ls> raised from some other cause; <ls>Amaru. 88</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 8</ls>; फलोदय <ls>R. 1. 5</ls> rising or accomplishment of the fruit; <ls>Ms. 3. 169</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Creation (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रलय); यौ तौ स्वप्नावबोधौ तौ भूतानां प्रलयोदयौ <ls>Ku. 2. 8.</ls> {@--4@} The eastern mountain (behind which the sun is supposed to rise); यैर्यत्र दृश्यते भास्वान्स तेषामुदयः स्मृतः; उदयगूढशशांकमरीचिभिः <ls>V. 3. 6.</ls> {@--5@} Advancement, prosperity, rise; (<ab>opp.</ab> व्यसन); तेजोद्वयस्य युगपद्व्यसनोदयाभ्यां <ls>Ś. 4. 1</ls>; उदये मदवाच्यमुज्झता <ls>R. 8. 84</ls>; <ls>K. 5</ls>; importance, celebrity; °उन्मुखे त्वयि <ls>R. 11. 73.</ls> {@--6@} Elevation, exaltation, rise, growth; उदयमस्तमयं च रघूद्वहात् <ls>R. 9. 9</ls>; तमुदयाय न वा नवयौवना <ls n="R. 9.">7</ls>; आत्मोदयः परग्लानिः <ls>Śi. 2. 30</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">11. 60.</ls> {@--7@} Result, consequence; असुखोदयं कर्म <ls>Ms. 4. 70</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 42</ls>; following; नोदात्तस्वरितोदयं <ls>P. VIII. 4. 67.</ls> {@--8@} Accomplishment, fulfilment; उपस्थितोदयं <ls>R. 3. 1</ls>; प्रारंभसदृशोदयः <ls n="R.">1. 15.</ls> {@--9@} Profit, advantage. {@--10@} Income, revenue; <ls>Ms. 7. 55</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 43.</ls> {@--11@} Interest, consideration paid for the use of money; <ls>Y. 2. 67</ls>, <ls n="Y. 2.">146.</ls> {@--12@} Light, splendour. {@--13@} Outlet, exit.
